Dame Carolyn Paula Hamilton DBE (amụrụ yá n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1951) bụ onye ọka iwu nke ọkachamara n'ihe banyere ikike ụmụaka
Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi nke Coram Children's Legal Centre, otu ọrụ ebere mba nwere onwe ya nke raara onwe ya nye nkwalite na mmejuputa ikike ụmụaka nke dị na Mahadum Essex
Hamilton nwere ọkwa prọfesọ na Essex.
A mụrụ Carolyn Paula Hamilton na Hendon, London, n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1951 nye David Hamilton (nwụrụ ná 2007) na nwunye ya bú Laura
O nwere nwanne nwoke Alan S
Nna ya gbapụrụ na Nazi Germany mgbe ọ bụ nwata nwoke tupu Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ na ụgbọ mmiri Kindertransport mbụ gaa England ma mesịa nweta ego na ala na ụlọ na ejiji
N'ime afọ 2016, esemokwu dị n'etiti Carolyn na nwanne ya nwoke Alan banyere nkewa nke ala nna ha ghọrọ isiokwu nke ikpe ikpe siri ike.
Hamilton bụ onye ọka iwu nke ọkachamara na ikike ụmụaka

N'ime afọ 1995, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nduzi nke Coram Children's Legal Centre, otu ọrụ ebere mba nwere onwe ya nke raara onwe ya nye nkwalite na mmejuputa ikike ụmụaka nke dị na Mahadum Essex ebe Hamilton bụ onye otu ngalaba iwu. Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ na ikpe ziri ezi nke ụmụaka na Office of the High Commissioner for Human Rights bídó n'afọ 2001 rụọ afọ 2003
Ọ bụ Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ụmụaka na ezinụlọ maka Kọmitii Ọrụ Iwu ruo Disemba 2010.
A họpụtara ya Dame Commander of the Order of the British Empire (DBE) na 2017 Birthday Honours maka ọrụ maka ikike ụmụaka.
